settings.heading: STEP 2 – SELECT STANDARD OR HIGH-PERFORMANCE LRU KIT

settings.banner_heading: Build Your Custom Garmin G3X Package
settings.banner_desc:
Use the worksheet below to compile a list of the components that you need to get the features and
capabilities you're looking for in your Garmin G3X system. Once you have selected all of the items,
submit a request at the bottom of the page and we will provide you with a comprehensive
quote including a discount based on the package as a whole.
settings.html_desc: Use the worksheet below to compile a list of the components that you need to get the features and capabilities you're looking for in your Garmin G3X system. Once you have selected all of the items, submit a request at the bottom of the page and we will provide you with a comprehensive quote including a discount based on the package as a whole.
